subject: Pre-Order Question: Shipping to Israel on Dec 10th
description_text:
Hello,

I plan to place an order on around December 10th for your Plus X Pedals and the VAM Pro haptic motor set.

My question is about shipping to Israel, where import taxes are very high. To help manage this, would it be possible for you to include a low-declaration commercial invoice with the shipment?

Thanks for your help!

Best regards,
Cosmin

conversations.body_text: Hi Cosmin Alin,    Sure thing. We'll file the declaration according to your requirements. After placing the order, please send us a message to remind us.

Thank you very much!

Here is 18% on everything over 75$.. just wanted to make sure we can find a way around it, I ll get back to you after I ll place the order in december!

Best regards,
Cosmin



-------- Mesaj original --------
De la: support@simsonn.com
Date: 24.11.2025 08:43 (GMT+02:00)
Către: cosmin12300@hotmail.com
Subiect: Re: Pre-Order Question: Shipping to Israel on Dec 10th

Hi Cosmin Alin,

Sure thing. We'll file the declaration according to your requirements. After placing the order, please send us a message to remind us.

Hi!

I placed the order, the number of the order is #SSN4627 I hope it s possible to ship it with a declaration under 75$, waiting to hear from you! Thank you very much!

-------- Mesaj original --------
De la: support@simsonn.com
Date: 24.11.2025 08:43 (GMT+02:00)
Către: cosmin12300@hotmail.com
Subiect: Re: Pre-Order Question: Shipping to Israel on Dec 10th

Hi Cosmin Alin,

Sure thing. We'll file the declaration according to your requirements. After placing the order, please send us a message to remind us.
